embed.title: 🧪 When’s the Mint?
embed.description:
⛏️ **Mint is coming soon but the date is not set yet !** — Used the `/mint` command to know more about it.

Stay active, help the community, and climb the Bandit ranks to increase your chances of getting a last minute whitelist.

> _“A true Bandit prepares before the heist.”_ – Wise Gangster
